name: garrulously
content:
Add to word list

in a way that involves talking a lot, especially about things that are not important: He seemed in very good humour, laughing and talking garrulously. The children chatted garrulously and loudly with each other. See
garrulous
More examplesFewer examplesShe was clearly nervous, chatting garrulously about the "gorgeous venue".The DJs spent the majority of airtime talking inanely and garrulously about nothing in particular.They sat talking garrulously on public benches.
